explains: adj. 使徒的；使徒时代的

sentences.en: He saw his vocation as one of prayer and apostolic work.
sentences.cn: 他把祷告和从事基督使徒的工作视为自己的使命。

sentences.en: He was appointed Apostolic Administrator of Minsk by Pope John Paul II.
sentences.cn: 他被教皇约翰-保罗二世任命为明斯克的宗座署理。

sentences.en: So this is a post-apostolic letter.
sentences.cn: 因此说明这封信是后使徒时代的。
